title: Historic Duplex Residence with Elegant Workspace in Srodmiescie
description: Step inside this enchanting duplex where pre-war architectural charm meets modern convenience. Spanning a generous 148 sqm, the home features four spacious bedrooms, original parquet flooring, tall ceilings, and meticulously preserved molding details. Natural light saturates every corner, offering the perfect balance for living and working in comfort. Two refined bathrooms and a modernized kitchen provide everyday luxury, while dedicated home office quarters inspire both creativity and productivity.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the heart of Katowice’s Srodmiescie, this vibrant urban neighborhood blends family-friendly atmosphere with an artistic, entrepreneurial edge. Discover eclectic cafés, acclaimed galleries, and the warmth of a tight-knit creative community—all within walking distance. With extensive public transport options and scenic bike lanes, the best of city life is always at your doorstep.
lifestyle_benefits: walkable access to business and culture
balanced living for work and leisure
proximity to urban parks and schools
target_buyer: Ideal for innovative entrepreneurs, families seeking generous space with entrepreneurial flair, and anyone valuing both classic style and workplace flexibility.
market_positioning: A rarity for Srodmiescie, this duplex offers historic character harmonized with contemporary amenities—positioned as a prestigious address for discerning professionals amid Katowice’s dynamic city center.
